sqlReaderQuery.value:
select
    gjae1.RECID,
    gjae1.TRANSACTIONCURRENCYCODE,
    gjae1.GENERALJOURNALENTRY,
    gjae1.LEDGERDIMENSION,
    gjae1.MAINACCOUNT,
    gjae1.REASONREF,
    gjae1.POSTINGTYPE,
    gjae1.ISCORRECTION,
    gjae1.ISCREDIT,
    gjae1.CREATEDDATETIME,
    gjae1.LEDGERACCOUNT,
    gjae1.QUANTITY,
    gjae1.ACCOUNTINGCURRENCYAMOUNT,
    gjae1.REPORTINGCURRENCYAMOUNT,
    gjae1.TRANSACTIONCURRENCYAMOUNT,
    gjae1.MODIFIEDDATETIME,
    gje1.FISCALCALENDARPERIOD as GENERALJOURNALENTRY_FISCALCALENDARPERIOD,
    gje1.LEDGER as GENERALJOURNALENTRY_LEDGER,
    gje1.JOURNALCATEGORY as GENERALJOURNALENTRY_JOURNALCATEGORY,
    gje1.ACCOUNTINGDATE as GENERALJOURNALENTRY_ACCOUNTINGDATE,
    gje1.ACKNOWLEDGEMENTDATE as GENERALJOURNALENTRY_ACKNOWLEDGEMENTDATE,
    gje1.DOCUMENTDATE as GENERALJOURNALENTRY_DOCUMENTDATE,
    gje1.DOCUMENTNUMBER as GENERALJOURNALENTRY_DOCUMENTNUMBER,
    gje1.SUBLEDGERVOUCHERDATAAREAID as GENERALJOURNALENTRY_SUBLEDGERVOUCHERDATAAREAID,
    gje1.JOURNALNUMBER as GENERALJOURNALENTRY_JOURNALNUMBER,
    gje1.SUBLEDGERVOUCHER as GENERALJOURNALENTRY_SUBLEDGERVOUCHER,
    gje1.LEDGERENTRYJOURNAL as GENERALJOURNALENTRY_LEDGERENTRYJOURNAL,
    gje1.MODIFIEDDATETIME as GENERALJOURNALENTRY_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
    lej1.JOURNALNUMBER as LEDGERENTRYJOURNAL_JOURNALNUMBER,
    lej1.MODIFIEDDATETIME as LEDGERENTRYJOURNAL_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
    ljt1.JOURNALNAME as LEDGERJOURNALTABLE_JOURNALNAME,
    ljt1.MODIFIEDDATETIME as LEDGERJOURNALTABLE_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
    ljtr1.TXT as LEDGERJOURNALTRANS_TXT,
    ljtr1.MODIFIEDDATETIME as LEDGERJOURNALTRANS_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
    tet1.ENUMVALUELABEL as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE1_ENUMVALUELABEL_JOURNALCATEGORY,
    tet2.ENUMVALUELABEL as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE2_ENUMVALUELABEL_POSTINGTYPE,
    (
        select
            max(lastupdatedate)
        from
            (
                values
                    (gjae1.MODIFIEDDATETIME),
                    (isnull (gje1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull (lej1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull (ljt1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull (ljtr1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01'))
            ) as updatedate (lastupdatedate)
    ) as LATEST_MODIFIEDDATETIME
from
    dbo.GENERALJOURNALACCOUNTENTRY gjae1
    inner join dbo.GENERALJOURNALENTRY gje1 on gjae1.GENERALJOURNALENTRY = gje1.RECID
    left join dbo.LEDGERENTRYJOURNAL lej1 on gje1.LEDGERENTRYJOURNAL = lej1.RECID
    left join dbo.LEDGERJOURNALTABLE ljt1 on gje1.SUBLEDGERVOUCHERDATAAREAID = ljt1.DATAAREAID
    and lej1.JOURNALNUMBER = ljt1.JOURNALNUM
    left join (
        select
            DATAAREAID,
            JOURNALNUM,
            max(TXT) as TXT,
            max(MODIFIEDDATETIME) as MODIFIEDDATETIME
        from
            dbo.LEDGERJOURNALTRANS
        group by
            DATAAREAID,
            JOURNALNUM
    ) ljtr1 on gje1.SUBLEDGERVOUCHERDATAAREAID = ljtr1.DATAAREAID
    and lej1.JOURNALNUMBER = ljtr1.JOURNALNUM
    left join (
        select
            ENUMNAME,
            ENUMVALUE,
            max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL
        from
            dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE
        where
            ENUMNAME = 'LedgerTransType'
        group by
            ENUMNAME,
            ENUMVALUE
    ) tet1 on gje1.JOURNALCATEGORY = tet1.ENUMVALUE
    left join (
        select
            ENUMNAME,
            ENUMVALUE,
            max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL
        from
            dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE
        where
            ENUMNAME = 'LedgerPostingType'
        group by
            ENUMNAME,
            ENUMVALUE
    ) tet2 on gjae1.POSTINGTYPE = tet2.ENUMVALUE
where
    gje1.ACCOUNTINGDATE >= dateadd (DAY, -90, GETDATE ())
    and (
        select
            max(lastupdatedate)
        from
            (
                values
                    (gjae1.MODIFIEDDATETIME),
                    (isnull (gje1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull (lej1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull (ljt1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull (ljtr1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01'))
            ) as updatedate (lastupdatedate)
    ) > '@{variables('v_prev_max_timestamp')}'
;

select
    gjae1.RECID,
    gjae1.TRANSACTIONCURRENCYCODE,
    gjae1.GENERALJOURNALENTRY,
    gjae1.LEDGERDIMENSION,
    gjae1.MAINACCOUNT,
    gjae1.REASONREF,
    gjae1.POSTINGTYPE,
    gjae1.ISCORRECTION,
    gjae1.ISCREDIT,
    gjae1.CREATEDDATETIME,
    gjae1.LEDGERACCOUNT,
    gjae1.QUANTITY,
    gjae1.ACCOUNTINGCURRENCYAMOUNT,
    gjae1.REPORTINGCURRENCYAMOUNT,
    gjae1.TRANSACTIONCURRENCYAMOUNT,
    gjae1.MODIFIEDDATETIME,
    gje1.FISCALCALENDARPERIOD as GENERALJOURNALENTRY_FISCALCALENDARPERIOD,
    gje1.LEDGER as GENERALJOURNALENTRY_LEDGER,
    gje1.JOURNALCATEGORY as GENERALJOURNALENTRY_JOURNALCATEGORY,
    gje1.ACCOUNTINGDATE as GENERALJOURNALENTRY_ACCOUNTINGDATE,
    gje1.ACKNOWLEDGEMENTDATE as GENERALJOURNALENTRY_ACKNOWLEDGEMENTDATE,
    gje1.DOCUMENTDATE as GENERALJOURNALENTRY_DOCUMENTDATE,
    gje1.DOCUMENTNUMBER as GENERALJOURNALENTRY_DOCUMENTNUMBER,
    gje1.SUBLEDGERVOUCHERDATAAREAID as GENERALJOURNALENTRY_SUBLEDGERVOUCHERDATAAREAID,
    gje1.JOURNALNUMBER as GENERALJOURNALENTRY_JOURNALNUMBER,
    gje1.SUBLEDGERVOUCHER as GENERALJOURNALENTRY_SUBLEDGERVOUCHER,
    gje1.LEDGERENTRYJOURNAL as GENERALJOURNALENTRY_LEDGERENTRYJOURNAL,
    gje1.MODIFIEDDATETIME as GENERALJOURNALENTRY_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
    lej1.JOURNALNUMBER as LEDGERENTRYJOURNAL_JOURNALNUMBER,
    lej1.MODIFIEDDATETIME as LEDGERENTRYJOURNAL_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
    ljt1.JOURNALNAME as LEDGERJOURNALTABLE_JOURNALNAME,
    ljt1.MODIFIEDDATETIME as LEDGERJOURNALTABLE_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
    ljtr1.TXT as LEDGERJOURNALTRANS_TXT,
    ljtr1.MODIFIEDDATETIME as LEDGERJOURNALTRANS_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
    tet1.ENUMVALUELABEL as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE1_ENUMVALUELABEL_JOURNALCATEGORY,
    tet2.ENUMVALUELABEL as TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE2_ENUMVALUELABEL_POSTINGTYPE,
    (
        select
            max(lastupdatedate)
        from
            (
                values
                    (gjae1.MODIFIEDDATETIME),
                    (isnull (gje1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull (lej1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull (ljt1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull (ljtr1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01'))
            ) as updatedate (lastupdatedate)
    ) as LATEST_MODIFIEDDATETIME
from
    dbo.GENERALJOURNALACCOUNTENTRY gjae1
    inner join dbo.GENERALJOURNALENTRY gje1 on gjae1.GENERALJOURNALENTRY = gje1.RECID
    left join dbo.LEDGERENTRYJOURNAL lej1 on gje1.LEDGERENTRYJOURNAL = lej1.RECID
    left join dbo.LEDGERJOURNALTABLE ljt1 on gje1.SUBLEDGERVOUCHERDATAAREAID = ljt1.DATAAREAID
    and lej1.JOURNALNUMBER = ljt1.JOURNALNUM
    left join (
        select
            DATAAREAID,
            JOURNALNUM,
            max(TXT) as TXT,
            max(MODIFIEDDATETIME) as MODIFIEDDATETIME
        from
            dbo.LEDGERJOURNALTRANS
        group by
            DATAAREAID,
            JOURNALNUM
    ) ljtr1 on gje1.SUBLEDGERVOUCHERDATAAREAID = ljtr1.DATAAREAID
    and lej1.JOURNALNUMBER = ljtr1.JOURNALNUM
    left join (
        select
            ENUMNAME,
            ENUMVALUE,
            max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL
        from
            dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE
        where
            ENUMNAME = 'LedgerTransType'
        group by
            ENUMNAME,
            ENUMVALUE
    ) tet1 on gje1.JOURNALCATEGORY = tet1.ENUMVALUE
    left join (
        select
            ENUMNAME,
            ENUMVALUE,
            max(ENUMVALUELABEL) as ENUMVALUELABEL
        from
            dbo.TIMEXTENDERENUMTABLE
        where
            ENUMNAME = 'LedgerPostingType'
        group by
            ENUMNAME,
            ENUMVALUE
    ) tet2 on gjae1.POSTINGTYPE = tet2.ENUMVALUE
where
    gje1.ACCOUNTINGDATE >= dateadd (DAY, -90, GETDATE ())
    and (
        select
            max(lastupdatedate)
        from
            (
                values
                    (gjae1.MODIFIEDDATETIME),
                    (isnull (gje1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull (lej1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull (ljt1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull (ljtr1.MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01'))
            ) as updatedate (lastupdatedate)
    ) > '@{variables('v_prev_max_timestamp')}'
;
